p: New antifungal agents are required as the currently available antifungal drugs are not effective completely due the development of resistance and undesirable side effects [ 291]. Leaves of Aquilaria have many bioactive compounds including flavonoids responsible for its antiviral, antifungal, and antitumor activities [ 292]. Artemisia sacrorum extract have two flavonoids namely sacriflavone A and sacriflavone B and both of them have antifungal potency [ 293]. Moreover, 2′,4′-dihydroxy-5′-(1‴,1‴-dimethylallyl)-8-prenylpinocembrin (8PP) is a natural prenyl flavonoid isolated from Dalea elegans, which shows antifungal effects against Candida albicans biofilms ( Figure 11) [ 294].
